summary: This bill, S. 2921, amends Section 7014 of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to increase federal funding for impact aid. The bill authorizes specific appropriations for various purposes, including payments related to federal acquisition of real property, basic payments to heavily impacted local educational agencies, payments for children with disabilities, and construction projects, with increasing amounts allocated year by year from fiscal year 2026 to 2031.
